channel.title: Bleach7 RSS Feed
channel.description: Bleach 7 - The First Source for Bleach Information, Media, News and Fan Interaction.

item.title: No Bleach Anime Again This Week | Chapter -107 Spoilers
item.description:
Well, I hope everyone enjoyed April Fools Day! I have a feeling that's everyone that didn't fall for DB's DaimondDust Reballion torrent. Anyway, just a reminder that once again there's no anime this week. Rest assured though, it will be returning next week.

Now then, spoilers for the next flashback chapter have surfaced! Since there's no anime this week, feel free to discuss the spoilers in the comments again.

BleachForums Chapter -107 Discussion Thread
item.author: mgviperman@gmail.com (mgviperman)

item.title: Bleach -108 HQ by Maximum7
item.description:
Well whats this? A new chapter of Bleach? I think so... But whats with that crazy -108 number shenanigans on there? Well its a special chapter, and it's a gooden. Is the chapter filled with a delicious creamy center? Metaphorically, yes. How are babies made? Well when a man and a women love each other very much they do whats called- Er, wait a minute, why am I explaining this, go read the new Bleach and ask your parents that question!

IRC Channel | Download Page

Page 18 was missing on the original upload, so if your one of the first couple hundred who grabbed the chapter soon as it came out, you may notice a missing page. Problem has been fixed now though, thanks to everybody who gave me a heads up on this.

Enjoy.
item.author: exiledviper@gmail.com (ExiledVip3r)

item.title: Chapter -108 Raw
item.description:
Yes, you are reading that correctly, it is a negative chapter. As you already know, Kubo Tite is taking some well deserved vacation time. So for the two months he is away, we will be treated with some flashback chapters, hence the negative number.


Raw Download Page
item.author: mgviperman@gmail.com (mgviperman)

item.title: Bleach 315 HQ by Maximum7
item.description:
Little late this week due to the holiday over the weekend, but here it is. The high quality scanlation of Kubo Tite's Bleach, chapter 315 from the Weekly Shonen Jump magazine, with just a hint of basil and other spices. Do enjoy good sir\ma'am.

IRC Channel | Download Page

And once again M7 is hungry for more cleaners! So if you have some spare time over the weekend, have Photoshop, and are willing to learn the exciting process of cleaning manga, we want you! We'll personally teach you everything you need to know about cleaning Bleach manga from start to finish, so not knowing how to clean manga is no excuse! So if you want to be super cool and sexy, PM me or email max7staff@gmail.com for more details on becoming a Maximum7 Bleach cleaner.
item.author: exiledviper@gmail.com (ExiledVip3r)

item.title: No Anime This Week | Viz Licenses First Movie | Manga News
item.description:
Hey everyone, I have a couple of announcements for you guys. First off, just a reminder that there is no Bleach anime this week. It will be returning on April 9th.

Second, Viz has announced that they have acquired the license for the first Bleach movie, Memories of Nobody. They say that there are plans to release the movie in theaters this summer in major North American cities followed by a DVD release sometime during the winter.

Viz Licenses First Bleach Movie

Last but not least, Kubo Tite is taking a well deserved rest according to sources around the internet. For the next two months, instead of continuing from where we left off last week, there will be flashback chapters, which could be very interesting in their own right. In fact, there are spoilers out right now! Since there's no anime this week, no need to wait until Friday to post in the comments, so have at it.

BleachForums Chapter -108 Discussion Thread
item.author: mgviperman@gmail.com (mgviperman)

item.title: Bleach Chapter 315 | HTS5 Update | Flomp-Rumbel 165
item.description:
What's this? Bleach manga on a Thursday? That's right folks, no RAW yet but Jojohot's Chinese scanlation is up for grabs. This weeks title is "March of the Death." Enjoy!

RAW added.
RAW Manga Download Page

High Quality Scanlation by Maximum7 is now available.

Discuss This Chapter at BleachForums!

--------------------------------------

Here's another HTS5 update for you! More characters have been revealed and they are as follows:

Hirako Shinji
Sarugaki Hiyori
Sado Yasutora
Gantenbain
Zaraki Kenpachi
Ikkaku Madarame
Nnoitra
Aroniero

Bleach: Heat the Soul 5 Official Website

item.title: Bleach Episode 165 SUB | Couple Announcements
item.description:
Hey gang its that time of the week again. This weeks episode is titled

Spoiler:
"Murderous Intent! The Joyful Grimmjow"


RAW
[CDevils] Bleach Episode 165
[Saiyaman] Bleach Episode 165
[l33t-raws] Bleach Episode 165
----------------------------------------
SUB
[Dattebayo] Bleach Episode 165
[Flomp-Rumbel] Bleach Episode 165 (XviD | H264)

Direct download of Dattebayo's version is now available.
Anime Direct Download Page

Discuss This Episode at BleachForums!


Episode 165 Screenshots


----------------------------------------

Alright guys, couple things to announce. First off is some disappointing news. According to Omni over at Random Curiosity, there will be no Bleach anime for the next two weeks. The next episode will be aired on April 9th.

Next up, there will be a new OP starting April 23rd and it will be performed by KELUN. No news yet about the ED but I assume that will change as well.

Last but not least, as many of you may already know, a new character by the name of Amagai Shuusuke has been announced. This character will supposedly be taking over as 3rd Division Captain in place of Ichimaru Gin. Joining him will be Kibune Makoto, who looks to be the 3rd seat in the same division. Of course this announcement may mean that filler episodes are in our future.

Bleach-Fan.jp Amagai Shuusuke Announcement.
item.author: joncherry123@yahoo.com (cherrybomber666)

item.title: Bleach 314 HQ by Maximum7 | Recruiting Bleach Translator
item.description:
Attention Bleach7 readers. There is currently a blue light special in aisle 12, download the newest chapter in Bleach chapter in HQ, and get your second download free! For a total savings of absolutely nothing!

Act now while supplies last!

IRC Channel | Download Page

Thank you for shopping Bleach7, have a nice day.

------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT:
We are currently in dire need of a new main translator for Bleach as our usual main translator has vanished from existence. So if you are a capable Japanese to English translator, have a free day on the weekend to translate, and would like be a part of the team by helping us translate Bleach every week. Then shoot me a private message for more info, or email us at max7staff@gmail.com.

Alright people, since some manga spoilers slipped into the anime post last week, the disclaimer's going back up. Please do not post manga spoilers in the anime post. This is to ensure that anime-only watchers will not be spoiled. If you would like to make a comment, do so in the BleachForums thread or hold it in until Friday. Any manga spoilers that are caught in this news post will be deleted.
